features: 【Ergonomic Office Chair & Super Comfortable】The design of the backrest fits the shape of the human spine, with the 5CM up and down adjustable lumbar support, the office chair will give your back extra support. The 7CM thick padded and high resilience foam seat also can relieve the hip pressure to offer you much comfort

【Adjustable Seat Height & Rest Mode】The height adjustment range of the seat is 46cm- 53cm (18.11'' - 20.87''), which can suit the needs of more people. In the spare time of work or study, you can enter the rest rocking mode by adjusting the back leaning. (You can learn how to adjust the height and backrest clearly through our pictures or videos)

【Stable & Durable Chair】The three-stage steel gas spring and heavy-duty nylon legs with maximum load of 300LB, certified by BIFMA and SGS. The thickened explosion-proof steel chassis is hard-wearing, all the details make this desk office chair use longer

【Quite Easy to Install & Installation Video】This mesh office chair comes with all hard wares and necessary tools. It takes may be 15-20 minutes if following the manual instruction. For easier installation, you can also watch the installation video on product page

【5 Years Warranty】We provide 5 years of after-sales guarantee! If there are problems such as missing parts, product damage, or other unsatisfactory issues, please feel free to reach us by clicking the "Contact Sellers" button. We will reply you within 24 hours and actively solve them. Thank you for choosing ZLchair office chair. Your satisfaction is our aim

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Comfort and Durability For A Good Price
reviews.reviewText: I have been thoroughly impressed with the performance and comfort of this chair.The adjustable height feature allowed me to set the chair to the perfect level for my desk, ensuring that I maintain proper posture throughout the day. The movable armrests are a fantastic addition, as they provide excellent support for my forearms, reducing strain on my shoulders and neck. The armrests also pivot up and out of the way, so my cats are less prone to jumping on/off of the armrests, scratching them.The chair's durability is also remarkable. The steel frame feels sturdy and robust, and the high-quality upholstery shows no signs of wear or tear, even after several months of daily use. It's clear that this chair is built to last.But what truly sets this chair apart is its comfort. The cushioning on both the seat and backrest is plush and supportive, making long hours at my desk a breeze. The breathable mesh back keeps me cool, even during the hottest days, and I no longer find myself constantly readjusting my seating position. And the lumbar support is not too intrusive but does a great job in keeping my back aligned.Assembly was a breeze as well, thanks to the clear instructions and included tools. Overall, this chair is a good value and I would purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good back-supporting chair
reviews.reviewText: This office chair was a really satisfying purchase. The mesh backrest allows for good ventilation, preventing sweat buildup even during long hours of sitting, which I appreciated. Additionally, the chair's height adjustment feature allowed me to customize it to my comfort, enabling me to maintain a comfortable posture while working.The chair's design is sleek and modern, enhancing the overall atmosphere of the office space. Assembling it was not difficult either, with clear instructions that allowed for quick and easy setup. Furthermore, the chair felt stable, providing a secure and steady seating experience even during extended use.Overall, I believe this office chair offers excellent quality for its price. With its comfortable design and functionality, it creates a pleasant working environment. If you're in search of an office chair, I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent chair for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Relatively easy to assemble -- not too hard, good instructions, minimal necessary tools supplied.Chair is well made, and very comfortable / ergonomic -- for a 6 foot 175lb male. Decently adjustable, especially for the price. You could spend crazy money on a chair, but you don't need to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid Pick for a Reasonably Priced Desk Chair
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a more comfortable chair for days I work from home. This chair was reasonably priced, easy to assemble, and seems to be made of good quality materials. The chair itself has a tall enough back to be supportive, but isn't a giant and bulky chair. The arms of the chair can fold up to tuck more easily under a desk. The mesh back breathes well. As far as comfort, I would give it a 4 out of 5. I am comfortable for most of the day in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for working from home!
reviews.reviewText: I just started a new position that required me to work from home. I took a long time looking at different chairs. I needed something I could sit in all day without back pain and something that could also lean back in because I discovered I really needed that too. I finally landed on this one, it was a good compromise on cost and quality. I was not disappointed. It feels like it costs more than it did. I had no issues assembling it and appreciated the extra hardware just in case the plant missed something. It's been comfortable to sit in and I didn't realize how much I would appreciate the fact that the armrests can come up. I have a small space and my back is to a wall, so to make the space feel bigger I like that I can flip up the armrests and put it completely under my desk. The wheels struggle to move on my carpet which is thick and heavily padded - I swear the previous owners wanted to sleep on the floor, it's absurdly padded. I ended up buying replacement wheels to see if that would help but it made no difference. So I would say the wheels are just fine! Even with the fancy "rollerblade" wheels it moved the same. I would definitely buy this one again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy office chair
reviews.reviewText: This office chair was easy to put together and is so comfortable! The back support in the chair works great. The arms fold back to a straight up position when you want to get closer up to your desk. The mesh on the back of the chair keeps you cool. The base of the chair can be adjusted up or down and the chair base has 5 wheels that make it stable. Been using this chair for several months and the pain in my lower back and backside has gotten much better. I highly recommend this chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I would definitely recommend this chair. The overall quality of the materials is good. Assembly was easy and fairly quick (instructions were sparse but still clear and understandable; no pieces/parts were missing). The chair looks great. The comfort and functionality- pretty darn good and reliable (and that's after owning for a few weeks, with almost daily use sitting for a few hours straight). However, I will say, I don't expect the chair's longevity against consistent wear and use to be extraordinarily great - we'll see. Obviously, you can't expect the same quality and comfort is you would if spending $500-$1200 for a genuine Herman Miller Aeron Chair. And I don't think this chair is misleading and trying to advertise itself as exactly comparable to a Aeron. Thus, I still give this chair 5 stars because what you DO get is well-matched against what you pay - it's a decent quality product at a nice value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk chair
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new office chair with better lumbar support to help with low back pain. This chair fit the bill perfectly. Easy to put together, good support, adjustable so my feet can be flat on the floor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Finally we got a proper chair for our office!
reviews.reviewText: Finally we bought a proper chair for our home office set up! We used to have a Costco foldable chair which was stiff. My wife complains that she has back pain after using our old Costco chair, and now I came across this chair and thought we should give it a try. We like the chair materials which are good quality. The breathable back is a great touch. My back usually starts sweating when I spend an hour in a chair but no more. I spent more than 2 hours to watch John Wick 3 (movie) yesterday and this chair is roomy and comfortable. by the way I am 5 ft 8 tall. Assembly is pretty easy, took me about 30 mins. The parts are well labelled so putting them together was not difficult at all, it provides all the tools I needed to assemble the chair. We like the black colour because we think it is easier to clean and maintain. Another feature we really like is that we can flip the arm rest up 90 degrees, because our desk is quite low , this feature is perfect because we could still push the chair against our desk when we do not use it and it saves space!

It is missing the ability to tilt the chair back and the chair itself. I purchased another ergonomic chair a few years ago for 300$ with both of those features and was larger, softer AND was able to go lower to the floor. Even at 6 ft 1 it feels like I am on my tippy toes using this chair without shoes. Very disappointed with this product.

I recently purchased this office chair, and I'm thrilled with my choice. The comfort level is outstanding, making long work hours a breeze. It's sleek and well-designed, adding a professional touch to my workspace. Assembly was straightforward, and the chair feels sturdy and durable. The adjustable features are handy, allowing me to customize it to my liking. Overall, a fantastic purchase that combines style, comfort, and functionality. Highly recommended!

Bought this for my son as his chair was old and worn. The instructions for the chair were straightforward and made assembly very easy. The chair is good quality with good wheels making movement smooth and comfortable . The seat cushion is thick and breathable so there is no worry of getting hot and sweaty he is able to sit for hours in comfort. Multiple adjustments make it easy for anyone to find just the right position of comfort and the arms lift up making it simple and easy to slide right under the desk and saving a lot of much-needed space. Quality chair and affordable happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Finally a quality office chair after all these years
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After checking all different brand of office chairs on Amazon, finally decided to buy this one after all the reviews I read. All I can is that my decision is perfect. The chair arrived next day after I ordered it, instruction to assemble the chair is easy and it even gives you a link which shows a video of how to put together the chair. The cushion of the chair is comfortable, flip up arm rest gives me the ability to get out of the chair on the side and leave it down when I want to lean back and rest my arm. The most thing I love about this chair is the adjustable lumber support, which I can adjust to my desire position to support my lower back. The wheel of the chair is very smooth, it's so smooth that my kids took it for a spin around the whole house. Would definitely recommend anyone who needs a quality build office chair.
